subject: All Star Games
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: It was a smart idea to have a ceremony where this year’s All Stars were joined by Hall of Famers at the positions that made them famous, but it would have been better to mic them.
snippet: It was a smart idea to have a ceremony where this year’s All Stars were joined by Hall of Famers at the positions that made them famous, but it would have been better to mic them.
